# app-icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Icon component that loads SVG icons from CDN with caching, sanitization, and theming.

## Properties

| Property            | Attribute     | Description                                                         | Type                   | Default     |
| ------------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaHidden`        | `aria-hidden` | Whether icon is decorative only                                     | `boolean`              | `undefined` |
| `ariaLabel`         | `aria-label`  | Custom aria-label (defaults to icon name)                           | `string`               | `undefined` |
| `color`             | `color`       | Icon color - either a jewel-tone palette key or any CSS color value | `string`               | `undefined` |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`        | Icon name (e.g., "angular", "react", "typescript")                  | `string`               | `undefined` |
| `size`              | `size`        | Icon size variant                                                   | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"` | `'md'`      |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                 |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------- |
|      | Optional content to display instead of icon |
